snippet: Beginning Wednesday, Pittsburgh and Philadelphia meet in the Stanley Cup playoffs for the third time in five years, the latest confrontation in an intrastate feud that dates to 1967.
abstract: Bitter hockey rivals Pittsburgh Penguins and Philadelphia Flyers will meet in the playoffs for the third time in five years; it is the latest confrontation in intrastate feud that dates to 1967.
lead_paragraph: Beginning Wednesday, Pittsburgh and Philadelphia meet in the Stanley Cup playoffs for the third time in five years, the latest confrontation in an intrastate feud that dates to 1967.

headline.seo: Penguins-Flyers Rivalry Stoked by Bad Blood
